marklogic.body:
Like so many these days this is such a sad and tragic story. Disgusting people live amongst us and bit by bit they are taking away our freedom. The freedom for kids to play Carefree outside or walk to school. The freedom of women to run errands or exercise outdoors alone. The freedom for a wife to walk away from an abusive marriage without putting her life in danger.
What makes a person able to murder another in Cold blood? Is it the way they are being raised? I have to believe that's a big part of it.
